title: HW15 - Binary Representation
description:
HW15 - Binary Representation

Convert a positive integer to its binary representation as a string.

Examples:

  • Input: 5
    Output: "101"
  • Input: 8
    Output: "1000"
  • Input: 0
    Output: "0"

Constraints:

  • Return binary string without "0b" prefix
  • Handle zero case specially
  • Input is non-negative integer
solution_text:
Binary Representation

Algorithm:

  1. Use bin() function to convert to binary
  2. Remove '0b' prefix

Time Complexity: O(log n) - number of bits

Space Complexity: O(log n) - string length
verify:
def verify(actual_output, expected_output):
    """Verify the binary string"""
    passed = actual_output == expected_output
    return [passed, str(actual_output)]
